Isle revival
 




Over his concussion? Rick DiPietro ends that discussion ... (AP)



    

    

      After a three-week stint off the ice, Rick 
      DiPietro returns to stifle the Sabres and even 
      the series up1-1. Wes Goldstein says the goalie's glove 
      should give the Islanders the needed confidence to 
      make this one spicy matchup.
    

  
 Related Links:• Crosby lifts Penguins | Series | Lightning top Devs | Series |  Watch!• Rangers win, go up 2-0 | Series | Playoffs: Bracket | Expert Picks | Blog


 


 

 





 Working extra: Yankees, A's put in overtime again


    

      
      For the second straight night, the Yankees and the A's go to 
extra innings. Jason Giambi breaks the stalemate in the 13th 
      inning with a home run and New York wins 4-3.
    

  
• Wang looks good in rehab start | Sunday games


 

 





 Pistone: TMS survives bumpy ride to the top of NASCAR


    

      
      It has been 
      rough for Texas Motor Speedway. It opened to bad reviews in '97, but 
      that's a memory. Thanks to great racing, TMS is among the well-respected 
      NASCAR tracks.
